special_text:
[+1]: Mill two cards. You gain life equal to the highest mana value among cards milled this way.
[-2]: Discard a card. When you do, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card’s mana value.
[-4]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana value.
